articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.title: Logitech’s Pro X2 Superstrike offers haptic-based clicks and rapid trigger - The Verge
articles.description: Logitech’s $179.99 Pro X2 Superstrike features haptics-based analog sensors, which it claims can reduce wireless latency by 30ms. It’s coming out in early 2026.
articles.content: The Superstrike is its first mouse to opt for analog sensors that rely on haptics to provide click feedback. The Superstrike is its first mouse to opt for analo… [+3338 chars]
